name: AmebiasisTestsForEntamoebaHistolyticaAntibody
title: Amebiasis (Tests for Entamoeba histolytica Antibody)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test panel names associated with detecting the presence of Entamoeba histolytica Antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Entamoeba histolytica Ab),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
